name: Blank Stare Before New Year
description:
A cute little Christmas clicking game where you can watch over a family of skeletons celebrating Christmas together, or completely ruin their night. THIS GAME IS ANYTHING BUT SERIOUS.

INSTRUCTIONS: Left-click to interact with things, right-click on objects to move them to a new spot. Hold middle mouse button to spawn more skeletons, R to restart, M to mute the music, F for fullscreen.

Now it's up to you to experiment with all the wacky things that can happen when you interact with stuff, always involving the skeletons!
